p1: In the event an invoice is not paid on time, to the maximum extent allowable by law, Contractor will charge a late payment fee of {LATE_FEE}% per month on any overdue and unpaid balance not in dispute.
p2: Contractor’s acceptance of such service charges does not waive its rights to any remedies for Client’s breach of this Agreement. All payment obligations are non-cancelable and fees paid are non-refundable.
